  • Method Details

    • openDbSearch

      public void openDbSearch(JButton closeMenu, JPanel p1, JPanel p2, JPanel p4, JPanel p5, JLabel dbBg, JScrollPane sp)
      Setting the JComponents to the proper valuers, properties, etc...
      Parameters:
      closeMenu - Button that will control the side menu
      p1 - Draw Surface 1 (Search Bar, Search Button, Etc)
      p2 - Draw Surface 2 (htable(will contain important data))
      p4 - Draw Surface 4 (Display / Edit File Area)
      p5 - Draw Surface 5 (Contains the Close Menu Button)
      dbBg - Database Background
      sp - Scrollpane that the info textarea is on

    • closeDbSearch

      public void closeDbSearch(JButton closeMenu, JPanel p1, JPanel p2, JPanel p4, JPanel p5, JLabel dbBg, JScrollPane sp)
      Setting the JComponents to the proper valuers, properties, etc...
      Parameters:
      closeMenu - Button that will control the side menu
      p1 - Draw Surface 1 (Search Bar, Search Button, Etc)
      p2 - Draw Surface 2 (htable(will contain important data))
      p4 - Draw Surface 4 (Display / Edit File Area)
      p5 - Draw Surface 5 (Contains the Close Menu Button)
      dbBg - Database Background
      sp - Scrollpane that the info textarea is on
